issue.title: [C++] Add API for writing additional record batches to a stream on disk
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1007](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1007). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
One would need to first scan the stream to reach the end, then append the additional record batches. The schema of the new data must also be validated.
